item.title: Hearty Oatmeal Apple Breakfast Bake for Busy Mornings
item.description: Start your day right with this Oatmeal Apple Breakfast Bake, a nutritious and delicious dish that combines oats and apples. Perfect for busy mornings or cozy weekends.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cups rolled oats
  • 2 cups milk
  • 2 apples, diced
  • 1/2 cup brown sugar
  • 1/4 cup butter, melted
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 2 eggs

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a large bowl, combine the rolled oats, milk, diced apples, brown sugar, melted butter, cinnamon, salt, vanilla extract, and eggs.
  3. Mix until well combined.
  4. Pour the mixture into a greased baking dish.
  5. Bake for 30 minutes or until the top is golden brown and set.
  6. Let cool for a few minutes before serving.
